comment: A linear shunt compensator has banks or sections with equal admittance values.
description: Adapted from CIM and https://github.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/ data models

contents.name: bPerSection
contents.comment: Positive sequence shunt (charging) susceptance per section.

contents.name: gPerSection
contents.comment: Positive sequence shunt (charging) conductance per section.
